Copilot.SystemMessage: Prefer MCP and CLI tools for non-trivial work. Use read-only helper tools for discovery and verification. Only answer directly when the user asks a short factual question.

ToolAccess.AdvertiseMessage: You have access to MCP tools configured for this session. Only use tools that are actually available/allowed, and ensure any required executables (for example: pwsh, node, npx) are installed and on PATH.

ToolUsePolicy.ViolationMessage: Policy requires using MCP/CLI tools for non-trivial requests. Ask a concise factual question for direct Q&A, or rephrase the request to run through tools.
